title: When AI helped doctors navigate the human lung, and save a life
description: In a groundbreaking medical feat, artificial intelligence guided doctors in Bengaluru to safely perform a complex lung biopsy on a high-risk patient.

title: AI has arrived, what’s the point of living?
description: At nearly 75 years, I have for long endorsed Bob Hope’s dictum: “I’m not afraid of dying but I don’t want to be around when it happens.” But, of late, I am more inclined to go with “Death, where is thy sting?” by the Apostle Paul, in 1 Corinthians of the New Testament. The simple reason is that I can no longer cope with the tectonic changes taking place in a world where AI means Artificial Intelligence and not the more familiar Artificial Insemination people of my generation were used to.
